project.name: |-- 001-basic-networking
project.description:
Keywords:
This project includes very simple examples involving Java networking.
UrlParsingDemo: Demonstrates how to parse a URL using the get methods of the URL class.
ReadWebResourceUsingURLDemo: Demonstrates how to read a web resource using the openStream method of the URL class.
ReadWebREsourceUsingURLConnectionDemo: Demonstrates how to read a web resource using URLConnection instead of URL. Also the response headers are read and displayed on the console.
WriteWebResourceUsingURLConnectionDemo: Demonstrates how to write a request using URLConnection. The code has not been tested.
